result.eng: We've had a small child for a year.
result.ga: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.orig: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.html: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.
result.ponchtml: Tá leanḃ óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.

result.eng: We've been there for two years now.
result.ga: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.orig: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.html: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ansin le ḋá ḃliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis
result.html: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teaċ anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: Meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: The horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ga: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.orig: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.html: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibhThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ponchtml: Na huafáis a ċonaiceamar uafáis naċ n-oireann focla dóiḃThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.

result.eng: We've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ga: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.orig: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home Rule
result.html: Is fada sinn ag feitheamh léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
result.ponchtml: Is fada sinn ag feiṫeaṁ léi mar Home RuleWe've been waiting for it a long time, this Home Rule.
